metadata.Title: CVE-2007-6762 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 2.6.20, there is an off-by-one bug in net/netlabel/netlabel_cipso_v4.c where it is possible to overflow the doi_def->tags[] array.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
